fragment: Walter White goes from a mild-mannered chemistry teacher to a ruthless methamphetamine manufacturer.
Jesse Pinkman is a small-time methamphetamine cook who becomes Walter White's partner.
Skyler White is Walter White's wife who becomes entangled in his criminal activities.
Hank Schrader is a DEA agent and Walter White's brother-in-law who becomes obsessed with catching Heisenberg.
Marie Schrader is Hank Schrader's kleptomaniac wife who has a penchant for the color purple.
Saul Goodman is a criminal lawyer who becomes involved in Walter White's illegal activities.
Gus Fring is a high-level drug lord and owner of the Los Pollos Hermanos fast-food chain.
Mike Ehrmantraut is a former police officer and hitman who becomes a key player in the drug trade.
Lydia Rodarte-Quayle is a businesswoman and methamphetamine distributor who becomes involved with Walter White.
